title: The Valley
creator_credit: Roger Scholes, Katherine Scholes and Edward Street Films
brief_description: Produced with the co-operation of the local community and World Vision Ethiopia staff in the Omo Valley, this film traces transformation of an area devastated by drought and land degradation into green and productive land, reversing the trend of environmental destruction and poverty.
creator_credit_for_label: Roger Scholes, Katherine Scholes and Edward Street Films
